function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Heterogeneous pattern of impact targeting surveillance and control","Impact":"Unequal impact on surrounding regions based on targeting","Mitigation":"Implement targeted surveillance and control measures based on risk assessment","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and movement quantification technology","People":"Population in areas with varied risk levels","Owner":"Health authorities and surveillance agencies"},{"Description":"Population movements leading to larger exporters of infections","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread to surrounding areas","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions in areas with high export rates","Technologies":"Population movement tracking technology","People":"Population in areas with high export rates","Owner":"Public health authorities and mobility tracking agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of human mobility on spatial impact of interventions","Impact":"Connectivity through human mobility affects importation risk","Mitigation":"Use spatial analysis of human mobility to target high-risk areas","Technologies":"Human mobility tracking and spatial analysis tools","People":"Population in areas affected by human mobility","Owner":"Public health authorities and spatial analysis experts"}]}
